articles.summary: 1. Config Compile Environment I am preparing to develop a tool using C++ in the Linux and macOS environments. Usually, I do not have root rights to download dependencies for C++ using apt-get install -y denpendencies directly in Ubuntu. However, I usually feel frustrated when the dependency chain is complicated. That means I need to download and compile every library I use. This may cost you one night or even one week.
